name: Remember Me (itch) (Xalph Five)
description:
Your best friend's dying wish was to be seen throughout the city. 

To have their chadly face be known by all. 

To be everywhere.

What better way than sticking posters of their face on everything?

Run and drive around town with your poster gun and stick as many posters on things as you can before the time runs out! 

Don't forget to come back home to restock on posters.

(there might be an issue where player control is lost after clicking off the play area - try not to click off the play area, or if you do, reload the page)

-----------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------

My submission for ZenoJam4 2021 (my first game jam!)

The theme was "I am everywhere".

Things to add:

  • Better enemy AI
  • More enemies and obstacles
  • More power ups
  • Improved visual effects
  • More levels
  • Fix existing bugs
